## Checklist
- [ ] Backend `go test ./...` passes
- [ ] Backend `go build ./cmd/api` passes
- [ ] Frontend build passes (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Docs updated (README/ADR/runbook/task) if behavior changed
- [ ] Screenshots attached for UI changes
- [ ] Database migration impact reviewed (if applicable)
- [ ] No breaking API contract without explicit approval
